27#pragma ident "%Z%%M% %I% %E% SMI"
28
29#include <string.h>
30#include <stdlib.h>
31#include <stdarg.h>
32#include <stdio.h>
33#include <errno.h>
34
35#include "utils.h"
36
37/*LINTLIBRARY*/
38
39static const char *pname;
40
41#pragma init(getpname)
42const char *
43getpname(void)
44{
45 const char *p, *q;
46
47 if (pname != NULL)
48 return (pname);
49
50 if ((p = getexecname()) != NULL)
51 q = strrchr(p, '/');
52 else
53 q = NULL;
54
55 if (q == NULL)
56 pname = p;
57 else
58 pname = q + 1;
59
60 return (pname);
61}
62
63void
64vwarn(const char *format, va_list alist)
65{
66 int err = errno;
67
68 if (pname != NULL)
69 (void) fprintf(stderr, "%s: ", pname);
70
71 (void) vfprintf(stderr, format, alist);
72
73 if (strchr(format, '\n') == NULL)
74 (void) fprintf(stderr, ": %s\n", strerror(err));
75}
76
77/*PRINTFLIKE1*/
78void
79warn(const char *format, ...)
80{
81 va_list alist;
82
83 va_start(alist, format);
84 vwarn(format, alist);
85 va_end(alist);
86}
87
88void
89vdie(const char *format, va_list alist)
90{
91 vwarn(format, alist);
92 exit(E_ERROR);
93}
94
95/*PRINTFLIKE1*/
96void
97die(const char *format, ...)
98{
99 va_list alist;
100
101 va_start(alist, format);
102 vdie(format, alist);
103 va_end(alist);
104}
